vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξουθεν-έω,
={ἐξουδενόω} [LXX+NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to treat with contempt, look down on, ridicule; (passive) to be rejected, despised reject
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to treat with contempt, look down on, ridicule; (passive) to be rejected, despised reject
also spelled ἐξουθενόω, to make light of, set at naught, despise, treat with contempt and scorn, Lk. 18:9; to neglect, disregard, 1Thess. 5:20; ἐξουθενημένος, contemptible, 2Cor. 10:10; of small account, 1Cor. 1:28; 6:4; by implication to reject with contempt, Acts 4:11
vocabInfos._es_Definition: tratar con desprecio, desdeñar ; despreciar, tener a menos ; rechazar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 看不起, 瞧不上眼, 不放在眼裡, 完全地藐視
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 看不起, 瞧不上眼, 不放在眼里, 完全地藐视
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: khinh khi; bị xem thường. Xem G1847
